articles.title: 'My heart is so heavy': Hear from the mother of an American killed in Ukraine - CNN Video
articles.description: The mother of an American citizen who died in Ukraine, Kathy Lucyszyn, tells CNN's Alisyn Camerota about how her family is processing her son's death.

articles.title: Products on the shelves getting smaller? You can blame 'shrinkflation' - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN Business correspondent Alison Kosik explains how manufacturers make small changes to products but keep them at the same price. The process called "shrinkflation" usually happens when companies are trying compensate for high costs.

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Elizabeth Wolfe, CNN
articles.title: California's Oak Fire has expanded rapidly as it scorches more than 16,000 acres near Yosemite National Park
articles.description: A ferocious wildfire outside California's Yosemite Park is "moving extremely fast" and limiting the amount of time authorities have to warn area residents to evacuate, a state fire official said.
articles.content: For more on the fires, "United Shades of America with W. Kamau Bell" heads to California to discover how communities are learning to coexist with the frequent destruction. The Original Series airs Su… [+5587 chars]

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: A sign inflation is easing: Walmart is slashing prices on clothing and other products
articles.description: Many shoppers have pulled back on buying clothing and other discretionary items as the highest inflation in four decades pinches their pocketbooks.

articles.author: Gloria Borger, Hannah Rabinowitz, Evan Perez, Ryan Nobles
articles.title: Pence's former chief of staff Marc Short appears before January 6 grand jury
articles.description: Marc Short, the former chief of staff to Vice President Mike Pence, testified last week in front of a grand jury investigating January 6 in Washington, DC, a source familiar with the matter tells CNN.

articles.title: Diapers cost families a fortune, but now some states will stop taxing them

articles.author: Analysis by Christine Romans, CNN Business
articles.title: Analysis: Welcome to the Great American recession guessing game
articles.description: The Treasury Secretary says the US economy is not in a recession. One of her Democratic predecessors says a recession is highly likely. The economists at Goldman Sachs put the odds of a recession at 50/50.
